description:
On today's post I talk about hotdogs, ebay and hollowness as well as the usual how I painted the Iron Warriors' Land Raiders and a 2200pt army photograph.

The post Showcase: Legions Imperialis Iron Warriors Land Raider Transport Detachment (inc. painting guide) appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: Showcase: Legions Imperialis Iron Warriors Land Raider Transport Detachment (inc. painting guide)
